Examples

Below are some examples to illustrate the possibilities and extensive configurability of twyg. All examples were generated using the built-in configurations and colorschemes, so you can recreate the same outputs with the provided build commands. docs/examples/generate-samples.sh

Note that you will need to download distribution package if you also want to get hold of the example data as well.
